name: Marty_Lindstrom
text:
Marty Lindstrom
Marty Lindstrom was the father of Norma Jennings and Annie Blackburn and co-founder of the Double R Diner.
Biography
Lindstrom founded the Railroad Diner in 1938 with his wife Ilsa Lindstrom. Following World War II, he attempted to rename it Marty's Railroad Café, then finally the Double R Diner. He worked at the diner until becoming ill with heart disease.
To be added
Behind the scenes
The "Marty" name is a play on the "Mar T" name of the actual diner location used when the original TV series was shot there.
